discussion.title: Implementing summation operator in PySR
discussion.body:
Hi,
I am trying to use PySR to get expression for potential energy surface of molecules. My data is pairwise distance matrix and I want to perform summation operation along particular axis i.e. $\Sigma_j r_{ij}$ where $r_{ij}$ is my pairwise distance matrix. I am new to PySR and can't figure out how to implement $\Sigma_j$ operator. Any suggestions is greatly appreciated.

Thanks

nodes.body: Can you do this with a custom objective function that sums along an axis?
